features: Clip on fan-The Rechargeable Fan has a strong clip, which can be stably clipped on the desktop, bedside or stroller. It provides 3 speeds and 5000 mAh of power. The fan head can also rotate 360°, suitable for bedrooms, desktops, and babies. car, car seat and travel use.

Stroller Fan-ATEngeus Mini USB Fan has a head rotation design, the fan head can rotate 360° horizontally or vertically, and can be flexibly adjusted to meet different angle requirements. The Portable Fan has a small size and mini design, which is convenient to put in a backpack and take it out.

Desk Fan-The Battery Operated Fan provides 3 speeds, equipped with a 5000mAh battery capacity, depending on the wind speed you use, it can be used for 5.5-20 h after being fully charged. Built-in brushless motor, powerful and long service life. The noise is low, allowing the fan to run quietly while maximizing the wind speed.

Wall Fan- ATEngeus Portable Fan has a variety of usage scenes. The fan has a strong clip. When the clip is opened, it can be a Clip Fan. The base has a non-slip pad. When you put it on the table, it is a USB Desk Fan. There is a small hole, and the fan can also be hung on the wall as a wall Fan.

USB Fan-The USB Desk Fan is suitable for indoor and outdoor use, suitable for a variety of scenarios. It adopts brushless motor and small size design, which is more beautiful, durable and convenient to carry out. The front cover of the fan can be disassembled for easy cleaning, so if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 1,093 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good and convenient
reviews.reviewText: pushes out a lot of wind, 3 modes. battery life lower than stated but adequate enough. pretty good, worth it. can cool entire person

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The size is what I was looking for. Small, but powerful.
reviews.reviewText: I love this fan. It clamps on a table or shelf. It has 3 speeds. The bottom is magnetic so it works perfect on my metal file cabinet. I don't have to worry about knocking it over. It's rechargeable. When fully charged it has lasted me over 6 hours. Great price, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fan for dog crate to take to dog events
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful fan to take along to dog events (agility). It holds a charge for a very long time and charges up very fast. It is quiet, even on the high setting and you can clip it to anything. My daughter uses it in her room for our little Cavalier (she is always warm) at night as well. It is very light and small to fit in a backpack. Very happy with this purchase and would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product for the Money!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. If you're heading into vanlife, you might be considering the pricey built-in 12v fan that rotates in all 3 dimensions. This is by far the better option in my opinion. You get more for your money than the pricey fan at a much better priceLightweight - keeping your van's conversion weight down is important for gas mileage, and every bit counts.Battery option - you can unplug the fan so you can use that 12v socket for another piece of equipment.Mobile - nice to be able to move the fan from the bedroom to the desk or kitchen.Mounting - use the very strong clip to mount to a shelf or tabletop. The bottom of the clip is flat with rubber feet, so you can take the fan and set it on your desk or table without it budging.Fan - high-powered. I rarely use anything than the lowest setting.The unit is medium-high duty plastic, so the motion is a little stiff. Hasn't bothered me. Battery lasts about a day. It took me a minute to figure out the control button - it's on the back, almost flush with the surface, and you press it multiple times to cycle thru the speeds to the off position. I use it on low, then press it four times to turn it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my golf cart. It is a pretty powerful little fan and I love that it is rechargeable. However, I wish they would come up with a better way to attach it to the cart. This works, but if you drive over a bump it comes off! I wish there was some way of locking it on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for camping!
reviews.reviewText: I used this primarily in my camper van to keep a little bit of airflow and this thing is AMAZING! Very powerful, yet quiet. I also like that you can turn it to reach any space, it's perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have very bad irritable bowel syndrome, which causes me to be very nauseous and have hot flashes, I basically need a fan blowing on me 24/7 and with this now I can! It has 3/4 settings, doesn’t need to be plugged in and is surprisingly powerful for being so small. And the clip actually works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little fan
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of them. They charged up nicely. I used to camp in my 4Runner. The fans worked all night long on medium. Have used twice. They put out a lot of air. The clamps worked well to mount the fans. Really adjustable so you can point them in whatever direction you want.

reviews.reviewTitle: Das ist mein aktiver Kamin Ventilator 100% LIKE
reviews.reviewText: Der Ventilator mir USB Betrieb mache super was er soll. 1. Stufe mega Leise 2. Stufe man hört sei leicht 3. Stufe Power ja ich bin da bläst aber die ganz Luft vom Ofen über das 35m² Wohnzimmer. Steht am Peltestank und bläst die Warme Lufte weg vom Gitter oben in den ganzen Raum. Vergest diese Kamin Ventilatoren sind alle Retour gegangen wieder an AMAZON.

Lo compré para la ps4 porq se me calentaba y se apagaba y va súper bien por ahora no se me calienta ni se me apaga y con el aire q tira si se te rompe el aire acondicionado va perfecto echa demasiado aire para lo pequeño q es

Hält im Camper auf kleiner Stufe locker über Nacht. Sehr leise, aber ordentliche Luftbewegung. Klammer ist auch sehr kräftig, kann während der Fahrt am Griff bleiben. Wenn er paar Urlaube, hält dann meine Empfehlung.

Prodotto utilissimo perché le piccole dimensioni e la punta robusta consentono di trasportarlo facilmente e posizionarlo anche in luoghi dove altri ventilatori non potrebbero essere utilizzati. Noi lo abbiamo in camper ed e perfetto. A velocità 2 la carica dura almeno 9 h. Si ruota in mezzo posizione ed è solido. Consigliatissimo
Er ist praktisch,man kann ihn überall mitnehmen.Gibt trotzdem sehr gut Wind ab,auf drei Stufen.Überall anklemmbar.👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻super
